ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: This was a very nice course where I learned from people who work in the film industry! I learned to write a script for the first time ever!

We learned the basic and detailed structure of a 3-act feature length film, how the film industry works for screenwriters, tips and tricks to make it in the field, and heard from many professional screenwriters about their own personal experiences.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: I would say that it would have been better for the Professor to do more lectures on how to write the scripts and have a better balance between guests and lectures. However, it was a dream to hear from such talented guests. Its something I could not have gotten somewhere else!

Strengths: The class was very focused on giving us the tools to succeed in the film industry as screenwriters. The combination of tools for screenwriting and tips for navigating the industry that we were taught was really helpful. Hearing from many professional screenwriters (including Prof Dewan!) about their own experiences in the field was so valuable and eye-opening. The fact that we were able to come up with our original feature-length film ideas, write out full scene-by-scene outlines, and write a quarter out fully was really incredible but also challenging. Weaknesses: it would have been great to have more classtime! It felt like there was so much we were being taught and we didn't necessarily have enough time for all of it.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: Yes! If youre passionate about film!

Yes! If you're planning to become a screenwriter or go into the entertainment industry at all, absolutely, this is a must-take class. If you're not but you like creative writing and film, I still highly recommend it!!
